description: Try our easy to follow Prosciutto, Scallop & Rosemary Skewers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prosciutto, Scallop & Rosemary Skewers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the prosciutto in half lengthways. Wrap a piece around each scallop.
Strip the leaves from the bottom of each rosemary sprig, then thread each scallop on to a rosemary ‘skewer’.
Drizzle over the oil and season with salt. Cook under a hot grill or on a hot barbecue for 5 minutes, or until just cooked through, turning once.
